responses: Don't give up hope,life is beautiful
It's ok to feel that way
Hiding your pain is not the answer

I will always be there to support you

I recommend you listen to One Direction, that will definitely lift your mood
I think you should just support for her and that's enough
Always remember that once you get over heartbreak, you become much stronger
You should stop trying to please who don't care about you
